name: ESTATE OF Harrison P. HENDEL, Deceased

parties: ESTATE OF Harrison P. HENDEL, Deceased.

opinions.text:
Decree
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each party to bear own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:
